title: Microsoft Viva: Inspiration Library in Microsoft Viva Insights
description:
,Inspiration library is a new feature available in preview through the Viva Insights app in Teams. The Inspiration library turns insights into action with access to curated content and best practices from top sources like Harvard Business Review and Thrive.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/viva/insights/personal/teams/inspiration
Preview date: March CY2022
